column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Tahno says : " Ooh , oof .
#Text=Then we 'll know who the losers really are .
#Text=" Tahno says : " Yeah , I 'm peeing my pants over here .
#Text=" Ring announcer says : " And now , the defending champs , the White Falls Wolfbats !
#Text=" Asami says : " Great job !
#Text=What a comeback , Korra .
#Text=I 've never seen a hat trick like that .
#Text=" Korra says : " Thanks !
#Text=But , if it had n't been for you and your father , we would n't have had the chance to play .
#Text=So thank you .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Uh , if everyone 's done with the little " thank you " party , need some medical attention over here .
#Text=" Korra says : " Ooh , let me help !
#Text=" Bolin says : " Owww !
#Text=Gah !
#Text=Have n't you hurt me enough , woman ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Relax , I 'm a healer !
#Text=I learned from Katara , the best there is .
#Text=" Bolin says : " No , no , oh - ooh !
#Text=That 's the stuff !
#Text=" Korra says : " Bolin , I 'm sorry I hurt your feelings .
#Text=I did n't mean to let things get so out of hand .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Ahh , I 'll be all right .
#Text=But we had fun together , did n't we ?
#Text=" Korra says : " I had a great time , honestly !
#Text=You are one of a kind , Bolin .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Please , go on .
#Text=I enjoy praise .
#Text=" Ring announcer says : " Your winners , the Wolfbats !
#Text=" Korra says : " What ?
#Text=How is it over already ?
#Text=" Shiro Shinobi says : " With a brutal round one knockout , the defending champs secure their spot in the finals .
#Text=I hope the Ferrets know a good doctor , 'cause they 're gon na need one !

#Text=" Main Asami Sato Bolin Korra Mako Antagonists White Falls Wolfbats Ming Shaozu Tahno says : " Minor Ikki Jinora Mo Ce Mongoose Lizards Naga Narook Pabu Pema Pro-bending referee ( semi-finals ) Ring announcer Shiro Shinobi White Falls Wolfbats fangirls " Shiro Shinobi says : " Amon 's revolution grows stronger by the day .
#Text=First , he attacked the bending arena !
#Text=Then it was discovered that Hiroshi Sato was the mastermind behind the Equalist gloves and mecha tanks !
#Text=And most recently , Amon ambushed Councilman Tarrlok , took his bending , and nearly captured the Avatar as well !
#Text=Everyone is on edge , wondering where will Amon strike next ?
#Text=" Jinora says : " Daddy , you 're home .
#Text=We waited up for you .
#Text=Is Korra okay ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Yes , she 's fine , sweetie .
#Text=" Ikki says : " I was scared .
#Text=I thought she was n't coming back .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I 'm sorry you were scared , but everything is going to be fine now .
#Text=I promise .
#Text=" Korra says : " Mmm .
#Text=Mmm .
#Text=The food tastes amazing , Pema .
#Text=I 'm finally starting to feel like myself again .
#Text=" Pema says : " We 're so thankful you 're home safe .
#Text=" Asami says : " Let me help .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Korra , I realize you 've been through a lot , but I need to know everything that happened .
#Text=" Korra says : " Well , first off , Tarrlok is n't who he says he is .
#Text=He 's Yakone 's son .
#Text=" Lin says : " It all makes sense now .
#Text=That 's how Tarrlok was able to bloodbend us without a full moon .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " But how did you escape ?
#Text=And where 's Tarrlok ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Amon captured him , and took his bending .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " What ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Yeah , he showed up out of nowhere .
#Text=He almost got me , too .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " This is very disturbing news .
#Text=Amon is becoming emboldened .
#Text=Taking out a councilman , almost capturing the Avatar ... I fear Amon is entering his endgame .
#Text=" Asami says : " Pema , are you all right ?
#Text=" Pema says : " The baby is ... just kicking , really hard , is all .
#Text=I 'm fine .
#Text=" Asami says : " Should I get Tenzin ?
#Text=" Pema says : " No reason to worry him , it 's nothing .
#Text=" Mako says : " Can I get some hot water ?
#Text=Korra needs more tea .
#Text=" Asami says : " You 're a firebender .
#Text=Boil it yourself .
#Text=" Pema says : " I 'm - gon na step out in case you two want to talk .
#Text=" Mako says : " Is there something we need to talk about ?
#Text=" Asami says : " I 've noticed how you treat Korra .
#Text=How you acted when she was missing .
#Text=You have feelings for her , do n't you ?
#Text=" Mako says : " What ?
#Text=No !
#Text=She was taken by a crazy bloodbender !
#Text=How did you expect me to act ?
#Text=" Asami says : " I like Korra .
#Text=But you 've been keeping the truth from me this whole time .
#Text=" Mako says : " The truth ?
#Text=About what ?
#Text=" Asami says : " You 're really going to make me say it ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Yes !
#Text=Because I do n't know what you 're talking about !
#Text=" Asami says : " The kiss , Mako .
#Text=I know .
#Text=" Mako says : " I - Well I - Bolin told you , did n't he ?!
#Text=" Asami says : " Do n't blame your brother for what you did .
#Text=Do you have feelings for Korra or not ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Look , things are crazy right now .
#Text=Can we deal with our relationship problems later ?
#Text=" Asami says : " Well there might not be any relationship to worry about later .
#Text=" Mako says : " Asami !
#Text="
